name: Last day in Happy Hell
description:
This place is infected and spoiled. 

You didn't just get here, sinner. 

The Gods of Random, who command the rules of the game, have changed this world.

It's your circle of hell. 

Time goes 3 times slower so that the torment lasts longer. 

It's not what it seems. 

Try to survive by changing 

every 10 seconds.
